website_summaries.verdict: These comfortable rain boots come at an impressive price point and are a fun choice in a range of novelty designs.
pros: Included insole makes these comfortable enough to wear all day
Fabric lining inside boots ensures no sticking
Lightweight design makes these ideal to wear year-round, as they’re thick and warm while light enough to prevent overheating
cons: These boots run small, so size up if purchasing them to wear with socks

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! They have a nice sole on them, they have a fabric lining so they don't stick to your ankles and they're cute! They're a bit shorter than I thought they'd be, but I'm glad. These are perfect knock arounds. I wear an 8 1/2, so I ordered a 9 & the fit is right on with the insole in.
customer_reviews.author: Rush

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these boots. Even my chickens had to check them out when I first wore them. I ordered a half size larger than I wear in shoes but they were still quite snug. About 3 months after purchasing them, they began splitting, first right across the toes and then right up the back. I was pretty disappointed as they're not cheap boots, but they certainly are cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: naomi steffanson

customer_reviews.title: Chicken approved
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots! They are the clear gel material and the pattern is actually a fabric. My daughter had a similar pair, and they lasted her years where as regular style rubber boots always ended up cracking. I also have gotten lots of compliments! Fellow crazy chicken ladies are always asking about my chicken boots. The one down side is that the calf is a little too small, But i have thick calfs. Order a size up as well. I'm usually a 9, I ordered a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: No exchanges. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Boots where overall good quality, however, the size of the boots run small and the company told me they are not able to exchange these boots for me, for a size that fits correctly and will not let me return them and buy the correct size. I am now stuck with boots that are too small for me. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Pope

customer_reviews.title: Coop Chic!
customer_reviews.text: These are super light weight! I was very pleasantly surprised they fit my wide calves since that is usually the number one reason I have to return boots. Easy to slip on and off. Perfect for my trips out to work in my garden or to visit my chickens in their coop!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews but this was worth it!!....LOVE, LOVE LOVE these!!! So comfortable with a soft, cushiony inner sole!! Top rims are covered in a soft fabric that doesn't chaff your calves! Nice thick yellow material and outer sole, looks like it'll last for quite a while.....and very cute chicken print!!!!...I'll be buying the red pair of these also!!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Are  they just the cutest things?
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fit as expected perfect for sloshing through muddy areas. Sometimes you want to be 5 again and slosh through the muddy water or maybe you just have things you have to do and don't want to ruin another pair of perfectly good shoes. These are great. I was able to wear them comfortably enough for a few hours of walking in rainy, muddy areas 5 or 6 inches of water. They won't be comfortable for all day wear but I wasn't expecting to wear them all day so perfect for my needs. Met my expectations. And did I mention... oh, how cute....??
customer_reviews.author: rulrich

customer_reviews.title: Boots of every crazy chicken lady's dreams!
customer_reviews.text: I adore these boots. They're more comfortable than most other mud/rain boots I've had in the past. It was a little bit of a splurge for me, but definitely money well spent! My daughter was jealous they don't come in her size.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: For everyone wondering whether or not these will fit wide feet, the answer is yes. I normally wear a 9.5 WW and I ordered a size 10 and had no problems with the fit. I also have a high insole and instep. You may not be able to wear super thick socks but they will fit comfortably. The horse pattern is gorgeous and I'm glad I took a chance on them.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I've worn these boots for over a year now and they're just as comfy and new looking as when I bought them. 10/10 on quality. Yellow chickens were so cute I had to come back and buy the red ones. I love these boots! The yellow is the color of mustard and very cheery. Sizing was a big concern, but after reading a thousand comments I decided to order a size up. I normally wear a size 6 and ordered the size 7, which was a good idea because they fit perfectly. I can wear them with thick fuzzy socks or thin socks, both still fit great. Attached is a photo of my normal size 6 boot for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: So Freakin' Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I chose the chicken print for my students, and the brand Slogger for me. These boots live up to the product name. What I didn't expect was for them to be so comfortable. I put in at least 10,000 steps working on a playground with kids during rainy days and my feet don't ache. Kids love to splash puddles. My feet stay dry. When the field is wet I also wear them. I'm impressed with the tread. No slipping. My ankles did have to get used to the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila W

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! But not for slightly wide feet :(
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots, they are incredibly adorable, fit around my wider calves (about 14" in diameter where the top stands on my leg). The only unfortunate thing is that I have what is considered to be medium wide feet and the boots are excruciatingly painful to wear. So bummed out about it because I was thrilled to buy these. I want to try to stretch them but I don't think it's possible. If you have a regular or narrow foot this boots will be perfect for you!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots that get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter raised broilers, so what perfect boots to use in the barn! These fit great. I normally wear @ size 9.5 to dress shoes ...and maybe a 10 in sneakers. I ordered a 10 and it fit nicely ... it fit loosely...enough that you can wear thicker socks if you want. My only "complaint" is that it might rub around the ankles...so be sure to wear a sock that goes up past your ankle. This may not be the fault of the boot. I usually wear low or no-show socks (fyi).
customer_reviews.author: Toodles!

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this boot but the color is off from the picture
customer_reviews.text: So everything about these sloggers is awesome except for the print. The green is not true to the picture (maybe the picture is altered with a filter IDK) but I litterally waited MONTHS for this exact pair to get back in stock in my size. Once they were in stock they were no longer on sale but I really love the green and goats so i went ahead and ordered. I dont plan to return them because 1.) they do their job in the whole being comfy and protecting my feet. I just wish that the green looked just like the picture. All in All the boots hold up to be a great product <3
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Douglas Adams wrote something about a man who didn't know he was a rain god. My wife seems to be a rain goddess. Every Wednesday she heads out to shop for two assisted living facilities. Every Wednesday she gets hit with pouring rain. I haven't plotted a histogram for Houston rainfall by day of week, but it sure seems like she hits the worst. These boots are great for gentle rain here, the kind that only gets two to three inches deep. They don't breath well, but they keep the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry picking in the puddles!
customer_reviews.text: After the big rain it's nice to be able to go down the rows of puddles and others can't! These are comfy for that purpose and my feet did not get wet. I wear an 8W in new balance and a 38R in Birkenstock and in Finn comfort. I would not go for a long walk in these, but they were perfect for picking strawberries after a huge rain! I think they run true to size and roomy. I'm glad I read all the reviews and went with my normal size, 8. Since they are plastic or whatever they are more comfortable with thin socks. Thank you all the reviewers on Amazon who are so much help!!
customer_reviews.author: U Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: My chicken coop slogger boots
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these boots. This is my second pair. They live on my porch and go on and off following trips to the garden, coop, and run. The heel tabs make it so easy--I hook them on the step and off comes the boot. Sizing is perfect. I wear them with and without socks depending on time of year. This is my second pair and I am still using the first pair in the garden (4 years old). I have to climb up and down a mountainside to get to the coop and the grip on these is better than on my hiking shoes! These boots get plenty dirty and they can stand up to it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Having lived in the desert for over 12 years rain boots weren't necessary. Then several months ago I moved to a part of the country that experiences weather on a regular basis so I clearly *had* to invest in rain boots to keep my toes dry. Not only do they keep my feet warm but they're comfortable and adorable - look at those cute goats?! I've even worn them when no rain was called for, couldn't help myself. Super easy to pull on and off, and I typically wear them with thick socks, but thin socks work too. Love these boots, they make me look forward to the rain!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Parker

customer_reviews.title: Sloggers Women's Rain Boots with Garden Chickens Print
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, these are great! I was so glad to get size 11 in a cute pattern like these chickens. I like to wear thick socks and in these, there is plenty of room for socks and toes. These rain boots are made well with a sturdy sole that rinses right off. I chose the egg yolk yellow because they are easier to see in dawn or dusk light, but I did like the "Barn Red" pattern, too. They're are light weight, and the top is wide enough to stuff pant cuffs in. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Eyre

customer_reviews.title: These boots are so wonderful. I wear about a 10 but one foot ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so wonderful. I wear about a 10 but one foot is maybe a little bigger, and I wanted to make sure I could wear them with all thicknesses of socks, so I got an 11. They are fantastic quality with a lot of nice added touches like a cool looking sole underneath and grips on either side of the top in case you have trouble pulling them on. And the design is so cute! Perfect for the rain and mud. They really seem like awesome quality and like they'll last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and practical!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I previously purchased a pair of BOGGS ( to the tune of $109.00),,,ouch! They didn't last 6 months before the heel wallowed out and I couldn't walk in them so I got a pair of Sloggers. First pair ( I'm still using have lasted over 2 years!). They're faded but still as functional as the day I bought them. Needed a second pair to keep in horse trailer so naturally I got another pair of Sloggers. The sole is comfortable, I have a wide foot, the boot accommodates that very well without pinching, etc. Completely waterproof but NOT insulated. I'm in Florida so insulated is not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: John O’Neill

customer_reviews.title: Adorable boots
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a Christmas present so cannot fully attest to their durability or water resistance. They are adorable. My three year old nephew immediately scarfed them from my sister and took off walking around in them. Do round up a size from your norm. She wears a 6, I purchased a 7 and they fit just right. She said they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Cute, waterproof and easy to walk in
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. I use them for walking the dogs after rain and bringing in the horses from muddy pasture. I got them on Amazon marked as 'pre owner' for $14. and they were like new. Good fit, comfortable, easy to walk in and waterproof. They have treads on the sole making it easy to walk in and difficult to slip. The flip side of this, however, is that, once dry, the mud in the treads will fall out. I just make a point of putting them on outside if I know they have mud on or hosing them off before I come in.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. I use them in my chicken coop. They are waterproof and long lasting. My daughter got a pair of Western Wear brand rubber boots and I got these. After 6 months, mine are still in perfect condition, albeit dirty, and hers are cracked and have holes where the boot bends at toes. We just ordered her a pair of Sloggers to replace them. Plus the Sloggers are made in the USA! I would purchase these again. I did purchase them again for my daughter because I didn't need to replace them for myself. I use them everyday and see them lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and seem well made however, I wear a 9 and ordered a 10 so I could slip them on and off easily with fuzzy socks in the winter and these babies are SNUG! Even without socks. Not easy to take on and off at all. Which is a huge pain. I go out to tend to our chickens in the morning and when I come in I have to pull each boot off with two hands. Also they don't have free returns so I am stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Runs two sizes too small
customer_reviews.text: I loved these chicken boots, but they are two sizes too small! They don’t have a lot of support, so it would be painful to wear them for more than an hour or two, but for just cleaning out the coop, or mucking stalls, they’re great. Easy to hose off, flexible enough to toe off. Great for warm weather. Hey Sloggers, if you’re listening, get your sizing under control or consider offering twelves or thirteens so we can wear socks with these boots in the wintertime!
customer_reviews.author: Bigdogzog

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Sloggers shoes I have worn for a couple of years when doing yard work and outdoor chores with the animals. I recently moved to an area where it rains a lot more. I walk the dogs once or twice a day through tall wet grass and standing water. The shoes were useless. I got the boots and they work great to keep my feet dry. They are not warm, so need thick socks if it's cold out. I have had them for a couple months of almost daily wear. So far they hold up great. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ella S

customer_reviews.title: Glad I gave it a try
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically buy a boot or shoes on line but I gambled eith these. Must say the color, style and material quality was really good wiith these boots. I wear with socks and feel comfortable. Can drive with them on. Wore at elementary school and workojust great meaning my feet felt ok inside or play ground duty. Design is fun and the overall color is attractive. Water proof? I hope but have not had the full test but viewing the boot construction I think it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: knitter2

customer_reviews.title: So much nicer than I expected!! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are so well made... the photos they use in the advertisement doesn’t do it any justice. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase!! The clear rubber is over the Inter material, and it even has these raised grips to help put on. It hugs my foot nicely and leaves room to tick your pants in. I normally wear a 10-10.5 depending on the shoe. Half sizes weren’t a option so I just went with a 10... it fits like a glove with normal FOTL mid calf socks on. Not tight, just huggy. They have really nice tread too!! (Not to mention super cute!! Can’t wait for the hens to check them out!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Goat approved and SO cute!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these sloggers almost as much as I do! No more poopy shoes for me, these boots are easy to slip on, and keep the water out. I have splashed water on them while taking care of my boys more than once, and my feet stay perfectly dry. They clean up so well, and fit great. I normally wear a size 8.5 in shoes, so I ordered 9 and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Flying pigs and dry feet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light weight, waterproof, boot to use in our dinghy this winter. These boots are perfect for that. I wish they were a little roomier to allow thicker socks. But they are tall enough to keep out the winter ocean when we have to land the dinghy and have been warm enough for that. I bought mine through Amazon warehouse and got a very good price but I think they would have been worth full price any way. Flying pigs also make a great conversation starter with other boaties.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful spring, summer and fall boots.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of these boots lasted several years. These particular sloggers I just had to have and I got a great price on them. These are good for working in the garden and yard, even walking the dog on wet days or walking through high grass. I love the Sloggers brand as they are true to size for me. They are not big and bulky with big lug soles like some other brands. I still have my first pair of Sloggers; they are slightly worn from much use but do not leak and are in good shape. I like that you can just pull them on if you need to run outside for something.
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots, they are adorable. They're super cute and serve my purpose well. (The print is under a thick clear outer layer,so you won't have to worry about the adorable print wearing off with constant use.)After I'm finished working around the farm, I give them a quick hose off and their good as new. I have had a pair of Slogger shoes for approximately 8 yrs and they still look like new, so I knew the quality behind this product would once again, be awesome. As far as sizing goes, I normally take a size 7.5 and I up sized to an 8, they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Knight

customer_reviews.title: They're Fine
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered the Slogger's clogs prior and liked them for gardening as you can walk in MUD and spray them clean with the hose -- I just thought I should have footwear that covered a little more foot/leg - These will work well but since I am not a boot-person, they will take some getting used to -- However, the fit is fine (wear a 7.5-8 - These are an 8) and comfort is there just a personal issue, I guess
customer_reviews.author: Meanne

customer_reviews.title: Love These Boots
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of these for years now and the rubber piece at the back had come off so I ordered a new pair. I got the blue one with the goats. They are so cute. The fit is really good but I did put a soft insert in for more cushion. The are very good quality and I like the height of the boot, not to high and not to low. I also bought a pair for my aunt who works in the yard a lot. She loves hers to. UPDATE: Got these just in time for a hurricane! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: sarah parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots for my feet. I have feet that are wider at the toe then get narrow, and they fit me perfectly. However, if you have wide feet you might find that they are tight around the ankle/arch area where they get narrow. Perfect for my foot, but I can see why some reviewers are complaining about tightness. Also, they only come halfway up the leg. I'm 4'11", so its just right for me, but if you want a long boot that comes closer to the knee you might find these to be too short. They are light and have wonderful support. For me they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: am

customer_reviews.title: These are so adorable size is off a tad !!  Just got will see about waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 sometimes an 8.5 I ordered a size 8 based on reviews, these were a little bit loose prob by 1/2 size( heel slipping) . Not a big deal will get some insoles to take up the slack. As far as water proof will post again in rainy season which is about here in fl. I got these for horse stalls and chicken coops but when it rains I need something water proof to get to my stalls etc. I have very small lower calves there is a lot of room but the top of the boot has a padding don't foresee any problems with rubbing on skin.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are quite pliable, & waterproof. No cracks, dryrot or uncomfortable bend spots after 4 months. They are completely waterproof & hot as a sauna in the summertime. They are a bit shorter than I prefer, with a similar height as a crew sock, rather than a knee sock. It takes a little practice not to fill them up while rinsing them off. Even with a couple small annoyances, I highly reccomend them. I wear them every morning to clean the horse barn, and every other time I need a quick, easy way to keep my feet dry while in the yard. With the cute pattern, I've even worn them grocery shopping on rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: TheresaM

customer_reviews.title: Best rain boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought. myself a pair of these months ago, and my daughter wanted one so bad. After doing some research, I realized the girls size 4 was a women's 6. We ordered these for her and they fit perfectly. We both love that we have matching boots (except when I am trying to put hers on my size 8 foot in the wee hours of the morning). They are very comfortable, keep your feet absolutely dry and are stylish too boot! Ours get a workout on our farm and they always rinse off easily with a hose when morning and evening chores are done. Thank you Sloggers for such a great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: MommaCed

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots for the garden
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I wear them outside to my garden and don't have to worry about all the red clay mud that we have in NC. Also not as concerned about stepping on a snake. Although I still don't want to step on one, I feel a little more protected if I did. I get back to my sidewalk and rinse them off and take them inside for my next trip outside. I don't like leaving boots outside for a black widow or other critter to crawl into. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chicken lover gift.
customer_reviews.text: She loves these boots to wear in her chicken yard. Even my son loves them and had to try them on for himself. The picture of the chickens are so cute and the yellow background is so vibrant. She said they even keep her feet nice and warm when it’s cold out in the chicken yard. They were intended to be rain boots but she likes them as her muck boots so either way they’re still being put to good use! Perfect gift for the crazy chicken lady in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Stinking adorable! Slightly narrow but comfy and seems like they'll hold up well. Got them for cleaning my chicken coop and they work well! I'd say they run a little small. I'm usually a 8-8.5 and I got a 9 and they fit just right. I would of probably even been good with a 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I do like these, however they are a little tight on me and I always buy a larger size than I need. I bought an 8 which is what I usually buy (I'm really between 7-7.5) as it's the only way to make sure there's enough room. I have a foot condition and I can't have anything too tight on my feet, otherwise my feet will cramp up. I can wear these, but I won't be able to use them when it gets cold out. A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Susyrip

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Runs very small. I ordered 10 and it fitted my friend who is 6.5. Me and my friend are women. I heard it runs small. I’m 9 and decided order 10. But nope. My fiend is 6.5 but with a thick socks she will be wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: oksana

customer_reviews.title: love love love these cute boots
customer_reviews.text: I just can't stop smiling and feeling good when I put these on to go out to my chicken yard. I just absolutely love them. They are comfortable and very easy to slip into. I don't wear socks, I just slip into them and go out the door. I don't wear them for more than 15 minutes at a time - only for my walk out to the chicken yard to feed and check on them. If I wore them longer I'd need to put on a sock of some sort because my feet start to sweat a little after 15 minutes. They are very well made and look like they will hold up great. Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cderoom

customer_reviews.title: My boots make me happy.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about size, having wide feet, but these fit great! I ordered a 10, where I would normally wear a 9. I needed something to feed/gather in which I could hose off and leave at the door - this fit the bill. I love the bright happy yellow and the decorations. My boots make me happy. I know that's an odd thing to say. I'm fortunate that they fit 3 members of my family, and everyone says they're comfortable. I would wear them in inclement weather without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Chasing Butterflies

customer_reviews.title: Not good around the farm
customer_reviews.text: I wore these about a half dozen times before one sprung a leak. Additionally, they were not particularly easy to slip on and off like a rubber boot should (and I bought a half size larger than my regular size). I have shoes by the same manufacturer and they have held up for years. Rather disappointed. These will go back.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B

customer_reviews.title: So cute but go a size up!!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I Love these Sloggers chicken boots for my garden & chicken coop. But size up!!! After reading some mixed reviews on the sizing, I originally ordered sloggers in my normal size 8. They were just a little too short in length & my toes hit the end. I went up a size to a 9 and they fit perfectly. I have somewhat large calves and So far I am having no issues with these at all. Seem very well made and the height of the boot (mid) is great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: You won't disappointed. After wearing store bought chore boots for years and struggling with the way they felt on my feet ,I decided it was time to treat myself to a new pair. What a great choice....these are the most comfortable boots I ever slipped on my feet! I can wear them all day and after walking through the chicken yard I found them to clean up very easily. That was a plus I hadn't thought of beforehand. As for the durability,time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Trevark

customer_reviews.title: Chicken boots!  Yeah!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a flock of six hens that I care for. I needed some comfortable slip-on garden boots to slog through the yard when I needed to tend to them in their coop. These super-cute chicken boots fit the bill. They have excellent water resistance and great support. They are pretty comfortable, too, but I wish there was a liner inside. They do run just a tad bit small, so I'd order up a half size, if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I wear them to do yard work, walk through overgrown fields, walk my dogs rain or shine. They are not warm by any means (I wore them to shovel snow one day) but put on some thick socks and your good to go. My daughter was eyeing them so I got her a pair. I don’t think they are going to wear out soon but I may buy another pair just to be sure I have my goat boots. Oh and they are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: melee

customer_reviews.title: they are comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have the shoes and these boots made by this company. Both are wearing incredibly well, they are comfortable and sturdy. I’ve worn the shoes constantly for 3 years. No holes rips or leaks. I’m hoping they never change the quality or manufacturing process.
customer_reviews.author: LindaG

customer_reviews.title: Great boots "Made in America"
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for walking my dog and working outside in the rainy and muddy conditions. I have a pair of garden clogs of this brand and they have held up well so I decided to give these a try. To sum it up, I love them! They are not only cute, they are comfortable, give my feet good support and are easy on and easy off. I see comments about the trim being uncomfortable and without long socks or tucking your pants in, the "made in america" trim/label that is sewn on is scratchy but not a big deal. These are GREAT boots for the price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Sloggers review
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister because she had so generously volunteered to help me work the vegetable garden this year. She loves these boots (and the flying pig design appealed to her boho heart). I have slogger boots also which I purchased last year. They have worked well to keep our feet dry and comfortable while we work. My eldest daughter wears hers to tend the chickens. So far we chicks are very pleased with our boots!
customer_reviews.author: dbedgood

customer_reviews.title: Best Wellies i've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE wellies, so I was devastated when my old one got a hole in them. I decided on these because they were super cute. They run small, which is perfect for slipping on. I normally wear a 6-6.5, and I got a 7 and they slip on and off perfectly. They actually have good arch support, and don't feel too heavy to walk in. I use them for yard work, and it is so easy to just use the hose to wash them off after!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchy

customer_reviews.title: I Love the Design/Lightweight, Well Made Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love my new boots AND slip ons. They are lightweight and well made in USA. The designs are stylish AND I don't have to move around with a heavyweight boot in summer. I toss on and go into garden. I am so happy, not to mention thrilled I found these. I saw the styles in our local garden store. They didn't have my size. I will buy a few more pairs WITH other designs. I look for QUALITY when I spend my money. I despise CHINA CHEAP JUNK and try to not support China. I received loads of compliments while wearing on our rainy vacation spot.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzysierra

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these adorable, they are actually quite comfortable and durable. I wear these every single morning and evening while feeding our goats and doing chores on the farm. They have great tread for the mud and are strong enough that the goats cannot damage them while nibbling on them. They are so much more affordable than the ones from the same brand at big box stores. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: SB12

customer_reviews.title: but good for very wet
customer_reviews.text: Ok in mild temperatures or indoor mucking out stalls and coops, but when it's hotter than 75 degrees and I wore them in a mucky outdoor sheep corral, my feet felt way overheated and distressed. Not breathable at all, but good for very wet, cooler environments or just short walks in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: VickyP

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer in a local rose garden. Winter pruning is a busy time for us. I needed a boot that had good arch support, did not rub my calf and was waterproof as well as warm. These boots are perfect. I purchased my walking shoe size and these boots fit my wish list. The toe box is wide enough so there is room for a heavier sock. The bright yellow makes me smile on cloudy days.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Very cute boots but they run small.
customer_reviews.text: Just received these boots. They look very durable. My only issue is that they are very small. I ordered a size 7 for my daughter who wears a 6 thinking she would have room to grow. They are too tight. They fit my 10 year old who wears a size 5 perfectly. So 10 year old gets these and I ordered another pair (in yellow so they're not the same) in a size 9. Hopefully they will fit.
customer_reviews.author: arylith

customer_reviews.title: Fun and comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Love my new boots. They are cute and comfortable. I wear a size 8.5 and ordered a nine. They fit nicely. I have regular width feet, the boots fit snug like a shoe. My feet stay dry in the rain and the soles are thick enough to be very comfy even if you walk on rough terrain. Only thing, which is a bit funny, when wearing them without socks my feet make a fart sound, lol, so I only wear them with socks :)
customer_reviews.author: diana deburr

customer_reviews.title: Great for the farm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister who lives on a mini farm. She had been wanting them to do work around the yard and when feeding the chickens. They are very cute and seem durable. She is normally a size 7 1/2. I bought her a size 8 and they fit her well. She loves them and says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D V

customer_reviews.title: Supper cute supper comfortable. However the plastic coating that makes it shine ...
customer_reviews.text: Supper cute supper comfortable. However the plastic coating that makes it shine started pealing off in less then a month. I’m heartbroken because everything else about these are perfect. But who wants to walk around in boots that look like you’re a shedding snake? If this didn’t happen it would be a 5 star. But being this happens, I suggest do not buy. Why pay for boots you can’t wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for about 3 years now and still love them. They are made of a very durable rubber which doesn’t crack or degrade. They don’t look as pretty as they did when new, but they still work just great. I use them when working in the vegetable garden and when cleaning out my chicken coop. They’re a little slick on wet grass but otherwise, I’m a huge fan of Sloggers.
customer_reviews.author: mip

customer_reviews.title: Great, Fun Rain Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought tall rain boots a few years back and they're great for a lot of things but not for weeding. I saw these and couldn't resist. I knew Sloggers is a great brand and loved the fun print. So far they're perfect for the job: tall enough to keep me dry but short enough to be perfect for weeding. I love that they're made in the USA too.
customer_reviews.author: Antics

customer_reviews.title: Size up or you can’t wear socks
customer_reviews.text: These are great for out on my mini farm. They are a soft rubber, good quality and very cozy. The only draw back is the sizing. I wear a 7 1/2-8 so I thought I’d get an 8 to be on the safe side. Well I should have sized up and gotten a 9 cause these suckers are tiiiiiight. I have no option of wearing socks because if I tried they definitely would not fit. So all in all, great show if you’re on a farm, but size up so you can wear socks!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, keep feet dry and clean.
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot with bad arches and was surprised that the next half size up fit me so well. I put my regular inserts in these so I can just kick off my shoes and slip these on, they're very comfortable! Great for venturing out in the wet and mud when taking out Fido. Feet stay dry. Good in summer too, they're a bit hot, duh, they're rubber, but that's OK, they're high enough to keep out dirt and debris. A backdoor necessity!
customer_reviews.author: Hermit Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great rain boots.
customer_reviews.text: I had my chicken boots for 2 years now and wear them nearly every day and they’re not showing any wear other than them being a little scuffed up from working in the yard. I like them so much that I just bought the flying pigs. I’ve tried on other rain boots and can’t even imagine how I would walk in them as heavy as they were. These are light weight, easy to hose off mud and completely water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Yellow Chicken Boots Are So Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, comfortable fit ( I've worn them full days working on my yard ) easy to clean and cute design choices. I just rinse my boots off with a water hose while I'm still wearing them lol no water leaks in; they look like new again after. The prints/designs don't fade or scratch off. It appears the boots start off clear and the design is printed on cloth which is then adhered to the inside of the clear boot. I'd recommend these 100%
customer_reviews.author: Rose Petal

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: First saw these boots in our local farm mercantile store but they didn't carry them in my size. When I found them on Amazon, I immediately ordered them and I love them. They fit well, seem to be durable (only time will tell) and they are perfect for working in the mud, irrigating or walking in the rain. The chicken print is cherrful, the price was reasonable and these boots was just what I was looking for. I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: P Davis

customer_reviews.title: I'm not big into rain boots but these are great. I absolutely LOVE them
customer_reviews.text: I had first seen these on a FB Chicken page that I'm a part of and I just had to have them. I'm not big into rain boots but these are great. I absolutely LOVE them. I ordered a size 8. I'm a 71/2 but they do not carry half sizes. The fit is great. There's enough room for a fluffy sock to be worn for chilly rainy days. You can hose them right off and they're clean. Easy to put on and take off. They're color is very bright as well which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Issy

customer_reviews.title: Fun Boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband had originally purchased a pair of Sloggers for me when we moved to our new 3 acre property. I love gardening but it is very hard on my shoes...they were always wet and dirty. Then he presented me with my pretty blue floral Sloggers (not the boot kind). I’ve worn them for 5 years now when I garden and work around the property. Now that we have chickens, my husband felt I needed something that would cover my legs a bit more so he got me these awesome Slogger Chicken Boots. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: laura p.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these rain boots and got to wear them the day after I received them. It was pouring where we live and we had to go to our sons karate graduation. We had to walk a really long way away to get to where we needed to be and these boots held up perfectly. My feet did not get wet, and the boots are really comfortable. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because it rains a lot where I live and makes a muddy mess in the field. Needed something sturdy to check on the calves in the rain and mud that were going to stay on my feet and be thick enough to hold up to the job. These fit a tiny but tight, but I also have wide, flat feet. Not to bad though. They are a nice quality. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: LNT in CA

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, very durable, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: The best rubber boots i have ever purchased! They are comfy for all day wear. They look super cute! I love the chickens! They are so durable and have a great grip so you don't slip. These are a bit thicker too so no flimsy feel. I've had these since July and they show no wear! I wear them all the time too. These are my go to boots to but on even if going to the store. If these ever wear out, I'll get another pair. But I expect these to last a long time. Sorry for the dirty boots in the pic. It was muddy outside!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: SO cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my sister. She's recently become a farmer of rescued farm animals and has over a dozen goats. She's in love with the goats and has been going through a lot of rain boots. As soon as I saw these, I knew she would love them, and she did. The colors are vibrant and the pattern is absolutely adorable. Even if they were a slid color, they are still a really great pair of sloggers. Very happy with these and will be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: yukicharley

customer_reviews.title: American Made 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a hard time finding some good outdoor boots and these are perfect. They are lightweight, great quality and the material is perfect. If you step in mud or anything else, you can easily spray the boots off and your feet will stay dry. These would even be perfect boots for the winter, enough space that you could wear thick socks. LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I can not express how much I love these boots. I wear them in the snow, rain, or mud and they do wonderful. They're comfortable, and that little black piece along the top that seems so simple is amazing. In normal rain boots it's rubber but in these it's a nice fabric material that doesn't irritate your legs. Which may sound like a small thing but this has always bothered me about other boots, and I greatly appreciate it! I get compliments on these all the time and the first thing I tell them is that they're made in America and they're awesome!
customer_reviews.author: MandK

customer_reviews.title: They got chickens!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love? I wore my previous sloggers year round rain or sun (not July or August) until my husband and coworkers had an intervention for me to toss them. So, after soaking several shoes this past Spring, I invested in another pair with a fresh print. These don't disappoint. I could live in them. I am told I can only wear them during rainy weather now.
customer_reviews.author: baby bear

customer_reviews.title: Not for ample calves
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. After reading a TON of reviews about how great these are for women with extra calf width, I went for it. I even found reviews with measurements, so I was confident these would work. Mine aren't ridiculously big or anything, just really muscular and a source of struggle for me for finding tall boots. Well, these didn't fit, so my search continues. Super cute boots, just made for skinny-legged peeps.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieD

customer_reviews.title: Chicken boots for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these just in time to work at the fairgrounds and I'm so glad I did. Amazon prime and these adorable boots saved me from a rough weekend of rain and mud. Sizing - I read the reviews and ordered up on the size. I generally wear a 7 to a 7.5 so I ordered the 8 and they fit fine with regular socks. I liked them so much I'm probably going to buy a pair of these or the shoes for my Mom. They are easy to slip off and on. I can't speak about longevity yet but I have already got my $ worth of wear out of them so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: rowdygang

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement for our heavy huge size 12 rubber boots
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight Rainboots, I love the Pigs Flying design. I ordered a size 9, which is one size bigger because of the socks I will wear when I garden and there is still room, so I would say the fit is as expected. These were bought to replace our really tall huge rubber boots. It is a nice height where the top sits on my calf.
customer_reviews.author: Marlys

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Myself and 3 chicken crazy friends bought these. We all wear a size 8 1/2 to 9 shoe and the size 9 is perfect with normal socks. They come up to mid calf and we are from med to tall and thin to heavy ladies. NOT a heavy boot. Perfect for cleaning coop, mud , yard cleaning, not snow
customer_reviews.author: patz

customer_reviews.title: First-time purchasing this brand
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches, so this boot feels a little tight at the top of my foot. They also rub my shins a bit. I'd never purchased this brand before, so I was surprised that the design isn't in the rubber, but looks more like a fabric covered by clear plastic. This makes it so the color is more muted than expected. Otherwise, these are great boots! They have great soles and are very waterproof. I love the tab at the back of the heels that makes it easy to step out of these boots.
customer_reviews.author: letipike

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought some "Wellies" on Amazon about three years ago. They lasted about a year and a half before they developed splits on the uppers and they generally fell apart. These beauties...WOW! I bought an 8 because I wear a 7 1/2 shoe and they fit perfectly with a light sock or with bare feet. I haven't broken them in yet, but so looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Beech

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Even though I am normally an 8.5, these size 9 sloggers are perfectly comfy with room for a thicker sock in winter. I love the flying pigs pattern (granddaughter remarked that, “Those kind of look like little kids boots, gramma.”) They are perfect for slipping into on the porch while potty training new puppy!
customer_reviews.author: Experienced Mom

customer_reviews.title: A great waterproof boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and am well pleased with them, we have horses so it was fun to see my boots with horses on them, They are comfortable. I did order a larger size because I have wide feet, this enabled me to put an extra gel liner for even more comfort as I often have to wear these all day. The only problem when worn for long periods of time is they make my feet sweat. But I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann LaCoss

customer_reviews.title: Runs about a 1/2 size small.
customer_reviews.text: The boots were adorable. However, I was disappointed that I had to return them. I have always worn a 7, so I ordered a 7. They were not true to size and extremely tight across the bridge of my foot. My mother ordered the same style, in an 8, who normally wears a 7 1/2 and hers fit perfect. So I’d say they are about a 1/2 size small.
customer_reviews.author: Shyne

customer_reviews.title: Size up if you want to wear thick socks.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal size. They fit just fine, easy to put on and off, but I should have ordered a size up to be able to wear thick socks. The boots are just plastic ----don't get me wrong, they are sturdy, but there is no lining. So thick socks would be beneficial to be able to wear in the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette K. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are on my feet at least once a day. Perfect for doing chores and not tracking crud back into the house, I just trade them at the door for my slippers, and it's all good. Easy slip off and on, pad in the footbed is comfy, I take long walks on the beach in them when its rainy out. I bought a 1/2 size bigger than my shoe size so I could use big thick socks. The perfect barn boot. Cute and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: rabidreader

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today so I haven’t used them yet. I’ll be using them for cleaning horse stalls and I’ll let you know how they stack up after a while. They’re very light and really comfortable. We’ll see how they stand up to horse “deposits”, both solid and not so solid. Will be back later to let you know how they held up after spending time doing the dirty work.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Landfather

customer_reviews.title: MEH
customer_reviews.text: A nice looking, fun boot---but sizing isn't wholly accurate...I always need to go up 1 size in boots due to an injury years back which has left me with a slightly misshapen right foot, and I struggle to get these boots on--and it hurts to do so. They roughly 1/4 size smaller than your average size 9 boot.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. G.

customer_reviews.title: So Adorable. Very Flexible too oddly. Do SIZE UP ☝
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. Wish the print photo of flying pigs was more crisp though. 🐖 Its flexible as you can see in some photos. Does feel nice to walk in. Ill update how they perform during the rain. Very nice. 😊 All the other reviews about sizing up were right. I usually get a 9 in boots because my running shoes are 8.5 but i bought this boot in a 10. 🤓
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great for feeding the chickens
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. Very well made and sturdy. Unfortunately I bought the wrong size and had to return them. I take a size 8 1/2 shoe or a 9, and I bought a size 9 boot. But they were too small, I should have bought a 10. I was going to use them on my ranch when I feed my chickens. But I do think they are darling boots.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great boots that do the job!
customer_reviews.text: If you needs boots to work around the farm or garden, I suggest this brand. They are sturdy, lightweight & water resistant. They hold up well for a few years if taken care of. (like putting them away-not leaving in them out in the elements) cute chicken design that always gets compliments when worn.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Wider feet order next size; your feet will thank you
customer_reviews.text: They are too cute! Fit nicely, although because I have a wider foot I order the next size up. They feel sturdy and look as though they’re built well. We’ll see how they handle this winter and next spring! I feel confident they’ll handle it all.❤️
customer_reviews.author: Alexis S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my old rain boots that I use while cutting grass, weeding, etc. Saw these on Amazon and thought they were so cute...different...so bought them. They are not as tall as my previous ones (which I don't like, hence the 4 stars instead of 5) but their overall comfort and support are very good. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: De De

customer_reviews.title: Great rain boots
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! Perfect for walking the dog or walking across the long parking lot to work. They're comfortable and very supportive. I've gotten many compliments on them, and I would not hesitate to order again if need be. Great seller. The boots came quickly and in great shape. I love them =)
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots until I wore them more than twice. They are comfortable for the walk to work when it rains but they leak. The whole point is to keep my feet dry for the 40 minutes total it takes to walk to and from work. After wearing them a couple of times, I noticed that my socks are wet when I take the boots off. Very disappointing since I bought them for a specific purpose and they don't live up to their name of waterproof rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot. Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these boots 4 stars only because they seem to run small. I wear an 8 and ordered an 8. BUT I can NOT wear socks (which is fine with me because the inside of the shoe is SO. DANG. COMFY.). But it makes taking the boots off an entire chore. I would order the 9, but I'm afraid of the boots slapping the back of my legs when I walk because they will be too big. So yes, I love these, but MAN I wish they came in half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

product_meta.title: Sloggers Women's Waterproof Rain and Garden Boot with Comfort Insole, Chickens Daffodil Yellow, Size 8, Style 5016CDY08
product_meta.description: Size:8| Color:Chickens Daffodil YellowSloggers Women's rain & garden boots are just the right height for garden work or rainy days around town. Lower & wider than most rain boots, there's more room to tuck your pants into, & just like the rest of Sloggers made in the USA boots & shoes, they feature "All-Day-Comfort" insoles & a signature deep Lug sole for great traction in wet & muddy conditions. Sloggers boots are made from 100% recyclable, medical grade material, so they have a soft feel, produce no odor, are easy to hose off clean, & will last for years. The sole contains up to 50% recycled material & when you're finished with your boots, you can send them back to Sloggers & they'll turn them back into a new pair! how's that for "reuse & recycle"?
feature_bullets: Includes Sloggers' Exclusive "All-Day-Comfort Insole For Maximum Comfort
Heavy-Duty Lug Tread For Excellent Traction
Fit Info: Whole Sizes Only; Fits True To Size; Half Sizes Order Up; For A Perfect Fit, Search For The Sloggers Half Sizer Insole (Style 330Bk, Asin B000Kma9X6); Height: 10; 5" Circumference: 15"
Hose Off Or Wipe With Wet Cloth; Removable Insole, Soak And Air Dry To Clean; For Replacement Insoles Order Direct From Sloggers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,436 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
